talk.author: did:plc:vzwe4zzwxpzvwsf42fodzuqk
talk.utter: Why?

talk.author: did:plc:v7o5bvq7r6wwpprapzgprd6i
talk.utter:
It usually points to two things: that I can't stand for:
1) Misogyny/ internalized misogyny
2) A tendency to avoid confronting and managing one's own insecurities, opting instead to villainize and dehumanize others bc of their personal choices.

talk.author: did:plc:vzwe4zzwxpzvwsf42fodzuqk
talk.utter:
Do you see any redeeming value in slut shaming for reasons other than those two purposes?

Like what if you genuinely don't like sluts and the way they behave/how that affects society?

talk.author: did:plc:vzwe4zzwxpzvwsf42fodzuqk
talk.utter:
Do you see any redeeming value in slut shaming for reasons other than those two purposes?

Like what if you genuinely don't like sluts and the way they behave/how that affects society?

talk.author: did:plc:v7o5bvq7r6wwpprapzgprd6i
talk.utter:
Redeeming value? No.

If a person has a problem with society, they should address whatever aspect of society has become an issue. Whatever it is, I bet more than body counts and sexual preferences are contributing to it.

talk.author: did:plc:vzwe4zzwxpzvwsf42fodzuqk
talk.utter:
Interesting. In male society we don't like thieves, e.g. So niggaz that steal from the fam get clowned on. "Thief shaming", you could call it.

I think everyone agrees that stealing from others is bad for society, so thief shaming is good for society. I contend that there are ppl who feel that way

talk.author: did:plc:vzwe4zzwxpzvwsf42fodzuqk
talk.utter:
About sluts too. To imply that ones choice in sexual partners has no effect on society is quite a position, one that I think lacks merit. Love and relationships cause trauma and social damage from lovers quarrels and other things all the time.

Sluts are people who have lots of unattached sex, which

talk.author: did:plc:vzwe4zzwxpzvwsf42fodzuqk
talk.utter: Which dramatically increases the incidences of these events This is why men particularly did not like Sluts even tho we still deal with them. I think there is value in policing behavior socially that has a social impact on others, which I contend is the origin of slut shaming, giving it social value

talk.author: did:plc:vzwe4zzwxpzvwsf42fodzuqk
talk.utter: Thoughts?

talk.author: did:plc:v7o5bvq7r6wwpprapzgprd6i
talk.utter:
Policing people's sexual habits when they have nothing to do with you is simply insecurity. 

People will try to sign reasons to it, but those reasons are never exclusively due to sex. It's just what some choose to focus on.

talk.author: did:plc:vzwe4zzwxpzvwsf42fodzuqk
talk.utter:
I disagree. Bestiality for example. Everyone benefits from policing that behavior down to zero.

One's sexual behavior affects others often in ways that are MORE damaging than other things. STDS, broken homes, etc. Policing sexual behavior collectively therefore has potential social benefit

Their pheromone senses have been overridden by animal pheromones+ thousands of years of genetically imprinted "attraction" (everything you do, GOOD AND BAD, is put in your dna so it's easier for your kids to do).

Mixed people including quadroons and octaroons who look like us inherit this from

talk.author: did:plc:g3hmuepxmgwqqyttg2ilaosk
talk.utter: I will say... we probably shouldn't rely on terminology from white folks like quadroons and octaroons 😉

talk.author: did:plc:vzwe4zzwxpzvwsf42fodzuqk
talk.utter: It's hard on this app. Actually they're not white and we're not black. Those are status codes in international law. White means indigenous person, black means criminal foreigner. That's why they always tell us how BLACK we are, because they want us to be considered as criminals.

talk.author: did:plc:vzwe4zzwxpzvwsf42fodzuqk
talk.utter: Before the 1960s we never referred to ourselves as black because we knew what it meant. Europeans also bent called themselves white until they came here you can read that on Wikipedia. Before that they always identified by country of origin.

talk.author: did:plc:vzwe4zzwxpzvwsf42fodzuqk
talk.utter: *Europeans also didn't call themselves white

I understand why you would feel that way. If you don't care I won't press the issue. I just ask that you think about it from time to time to see if I'm lying or not. 

Because if I'm telling the truth, the information I just wrote becomes kinda important. 

Take care bro

talk.author: did:plc:g3hmuepxmgwqqyttg2ilaosk
talk.utter: Ive spent a lot of time researching and writing about whiteness and race. So, you're right in the sense that not all Europeans would identify as white, especially if we're going back in time. The construction of race is a more recent phenomenon.

talk.author: did:plc:vzwe4zzwxpzvwsf42fodzuqk
talk.utter: The practice didn't start until the late 17 hundreds/18 th century, and it was to uphold this legal fiction.  By stripping us of our indigenous identity and getting us to self identify as black, they can use that as a justification to say we're self identifying as criminals and treat us bad

talk.author: did:plc:vzwe4zzwxpzvwsf42fodzuqk
talk.utter: That's why the police get away with the things they do. They're using gaslighting as a deflection shield to hide their acts of aggression and colonization under the color of law (black/white codes).
